comments.body: the join condition was wrong written. `t3` is not accessible here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +308,312 @@      t1.join(t2, Inner, Some(nameToAttr("t1.k-1-2") === nameToAttr("t2.k-1-5")))
        .hint("broadcast")
        .join(t4, Inner, Some(nameToAttr("t1.k-1-2") === nameToAttr("t4.k-1-2")))
        .hint("broadcast")
        .join(t3, Inner, Some(nameToAttr("t4.v-1-10") === nameToAttr("t3.v-1-100")))
